type ButtonTypes = React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement>['type'] interface ButtonProps { innerText?: string; type?: ButtonTypes; hidden?: boolean; onClick?: ()=> void; } const Button = ({ type = 'button', hidden, innerText, onClick, }: ButtonProps) => { return ( <button type={type} onClick={onClick} hidden={hidden}> {innerText} </button> ); }; export default Button;
